item.title: Jeff Koons, 'Rabbit', 1986, Kunstmuseum Basel | Artsy
item.description:
Jeff Koons, 'Rabbit', 1986, Kunstmuseum Basel | Artsy

Jeff Koons plays with ideas of taste, pleasure, celebrity, and commerce. "I believe in advertisement and media completely," he says. "My art and my personal life are based in it."

item.title: Tessiner Landschaft - Werke - Hermann Hesse - Malerfreude - Ausstellungen - Galerie Ludorff
item.description:
Tessiner Landschaft - Werke - Hermann Hesse - Malerfreude - Ausstellungen - Galerie Ludorff

Galerie Ludorff is one of the leading international dealers in German Expressionism, German Impressionism, as well as in Post War Abstraction and the work of Selected Contemporary Artists. The gallery is located in Duesseldorf, Germany.

item.title: Alexander Calder, ' Five Branches with 1000 Leaves', ca. 1946, Kunstmuseum Basel | Artsy
item.description:
Alexander Calder, ' Five Branches with 1000 Leaves', ca. 1946, Kunstmuseum Basel | Artsy

American artist Alexander Calder changed the course of modern art by developing an innovative method of sculpting, bending, and twisting wire to create three-dimensional "drawings in space."

item.title: Won Kun Jun Solo Exhibition at Youngeun Museum
item.description:
Won Kun Jun Solo Exhibition at Youngeun Museum

전원근 작가의 개인전이 영은미술관 (Youngeun Museum of Contemporary Art) 에서 열리고 있습니다. 많은 관심 부탁드립니다. Won Kun Jun's solo exhibition is currently being held at Youngeun Museum of Contemporary Art.

item.title: Steve Schapiro, 'De Niro in Car (Portait), NY', 1975, Atlas Gallery | Artsy
item.description:
Steve Schapiro, 'De Niro in Car (Portait), NY', 1975, Atlas Gallery | Artsy

A prolific photographer and photojournalist, Steve Schapiro has covered major historical events and captured seminal moments, from Martin Luther King, Jr.'s 1963 march in Selma and Robert F. Kennedy's 1968 presidential campaign, to Andy Warhol and Edie Sedgwick in The Factory.

item.description:
